languages.text: {n}Увы, были у культа и такие укрытия, поразить которые не предоставилось возможности. Осознавая, что шансов на победу нет, лидеры выродков отдали последний приказ — отомстить!{/n}
{n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, были у культа и такие укрытия, поразить которые не предоставилось возможности. Осознавая, что шансов на победу нет, лидеры выродков отдали последний приказ — отомстить!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they will not be able to win, the anathema leaders have given the last order — retaliate!{/n}
{n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they will not be able to win, the anathema leaders have given the last order — retaliate!{/n}

{n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，一部分邪教避难所避开了打击。当异端分子的首领意识到难逃一劫时，他们下达了最后的命令——进行报复！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，一部分邪教避难所避开了打击。当异端分子的首领意识到难逃一劫时，他们下达了最后的命令——进行报复！{/n}
{n}遗憾的是，一部分邪教避难所避开了打击。当异端的首领意识到这场战斗已经大势已去时，他们下达了最后的命令——进行报复！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, el culto también tenía refugios inexpugnables. Al darse cuenta de que no tenían oportunidad, los líderes de los herejes dieron su última orden: ¡al contraataque!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, el culto también tenía refugios inexpugnables. Al darse cuenta de que no tenían oportunidad, los líderes de los herejes dieron su última orden: ¡al contraataque!{/n}

languages.text: {n}残念なことに、カルトには攻撃不能なシェルターもあった。勝ち目がないと悟った異端者のリーダー達は、最終命令を下した...報復せよとのね！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}残念なことに、魔女団には攻撃不能なシェルターもあった。勝ち目がないと悟った異端者のリーダー達は、最終命令を下した...報復せよとのね！{/n}
{n}残念なことに、魔女団には攻撃不能なシェルターもあった。勝ち目がないと悟った異端者のリーダー達は、最終命令を下した...報復せよとのね！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malheureusement, le culte dispose d'autres abris impossibles à frapper. Réalisant qu'ils n'ont aucune chance, les chefs des hérétiques lancent un ordre désespéré : riposter à tout prix !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malheureusement, le culte dispose d'autres abris impossibles à frapper. Réalisant qu'ils n'ont aucune chance, les chefs des hérétiques lancent un ordre désespéré : riposter à tout prix !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leider hatte der Kult auch Verstecke, die unmöglich anzugreifen waren. Als die Anführer der Ketzer erkannten, dass sie keine Chance hatten, erteilen sie einen letzten Befehl ... zurückzuschlagen!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leider hatte der Kult auch Verstecke, die unmöglich anzugreifen waren. Als die Anführer der Ketzer erkannten, dass sie keine Chance hatten, erteilen sie einen letzten Befehl ... zurückzuschlagen!{/n}

{n}Unglücklicherweise besaß der Kult auch Zufluchtsstätten, die unmöglich anzugreifen waren. Als die Anführer der Ketzer erkannten, dass sie nicht gewinnen konnten, gaben sie den letzten Befehl — Vergeltung!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki tarikatın saldırılması mümkün olmayan sığınakları da mevcuttu. Kazanamayacaklarını fark eden kâfir liderleri, son olarak misilleme yapma emri verdi!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, the cult also had shelters that were impossible to strike. Realising that they stood no chance, the heretics' leaders gave one final order — retaliate!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne yazık ki tarikatın saldırılması mümkün olmayan sığınakları da mevcuttu. Kazanamayacaklarını fark eden kâfir liderleri, son olarak misilleme yapma emri verdi!{/n}
